channel.title: Perfect compiler
channel.description:
hey
my dad helped me make this: [code] @echo off title all round compiler COLOR 79 echo Compiling please wait... if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit [/code]
yea... compiles any thing aslong as you got any JDK6 no matter what update.

item.title: Perfect compiler
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“nubers, post:1, topic:361728”]hey

my dad helped me make this:

@echo off
title all round compiler
COLOR 79
echo Compiling please wait...
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") 
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit

yea… compiles any thing aslong as you got any JDK6 no matter what update.[/quote]
this does not compile my sandwich… on a serious note shell scripts are not fit for this section.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect compiler
item.dc:creator: @nubers nubers
item.description:
@nubers wrote:

hey

my dad helped me make this:

@echo off
title all round compiler
COLOR 79
echo Compiling please wait...
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") 
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit

yea… compiles any thing aslong as you got any JDK6 no matter what update.
